text: María Rita Calvo Sanz O.D.N is a Spanish Roman Catholic nun, one of the seven first women appointed members of the Congregation for Institutes of Consecrated Life and Societies of Apostolic Life the second highest-ranking department of the Roman Curia, the administrative institution of the Holy See since 8 July 2019, when was appointed by Pope Francis. On 27 July 2015 she was named Superior General of Sisters of the Company of Mary, Our Lady.La Compañía de María elige a Mª Rita Calvo como superiora general == References == Category:Living people Category:Spanish Roman Catholic religious sisters and nuns Category:Officials of the Roman Curia Category:Women officials of the Roman Curia Category:Superiors general Category:Sisters of the Company of Mary, Our Lady Category:Members of the Congregation for Institutes of Consecrated Life and Societies of Apostolic Life Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Rita Calvo Sanz
